help-file.title: PETITION
help-file.content:
Syntax: petition <text>
The "Petition" command allows you to send a message to all of the Gods currently on the MUD (if there are any). Certain guidelines should be followed when petitioning:
* Players (and Gods) are NOT to use petition as their own personal chat channel.
* Do NOT use petition for reporting ideas, suggestions, or complaints.
* Do NOT use petition to inquire if a God is logged on. If the God does not appear on the "who" list, assume he/she is not on.
* If you have a problem, please describe it in details right away. Do not force Gods to respond to any form of "anyone there" type spam.
Remember that the Gods abide by a non-interference policy. Petition should not be used to ask questions about equipment, areas, mobs or general game play.
If you have a question or need help with a problem, you can either ask another player, post on the Duris forums or petition. To speak privately with a God, use the "Tell" command. Or, if you discover a bug or typo on Duris, use the "Bug" or "Typo" command. To submit your ideas, you may implement the "Idea" command. Lastly, if you feel you just HAVE to whine, use your guild board (if you have access to one) or use the Duris Forums.
Abuse of the petition channel will only invoke the wrath of the gods. We expect EVERYONE to abide by this.
